py-dem-bones Examples
===================

This directory contains examples demonstrating how to use py-dem-bones in various scenarios.

Basic Examples
-------------
* `basic_example.py` - Basic usage of py-dem-bones for skinning decomposition
* `hierarchical_example.py` - Example of hierarchical skinning decomposition

Integration Examples
------------------
* `blender_example.py` - Integration with Blender
* `maya_example.py` - Integration with Autodesk Maya
* `max_example.py` - Integration with Autodesk 3ds Max
* `houdini_example.py` - Integration with SideFX Houdini
* `unreal_example.py` - Integration with Unreal Engine

Advanced Examples
---------------
* `blendshapes_example.py` - Converting blendshapes to linear blend skinning
* `rbf_demo.py` - Integrating RBF interpolation with DemBones for advanced animation workflows
